entry.title: another chance for folks to join D_D from @devntellxyz DevNTell has the best D_D logo yet.... can you guess what it's a homage to? 👑
entry.summary: another chance for folks to join D_D from @devntellxyz DevNTell has the best D_D logo yet.... can you guess what it's a homage to? 👑 DevNTell: 🌈 gm frens 🎉 To celebrate the @developer_dao #DevNTell being fully booked for 2022, we're doing a giveaway! Up for grabs: 400 $CODE and 1 D4R NFT Nominate someone you think should to be in D_D and why (can be you or another). Winners will be revealed at the end of the week

entry.title: Re We've also created a new space in our server called 'Byfander Town'. This space for those of you who might not yet be members of Developer DAO, but...
entry.summary: Re We've also created a new space in our server called 'Byfander Town'. This space for those of you who might not yet be members of Developer DAO, but would still like to tap into exclusive updates and competitions. You're welcome to join our server now, as well! 🥳
